price: 46. Qolodii Nuuxna iyaga hortood (waxaa ku sugan calaamo lagu waano qaato), waxay ahaayeen qolo caasiyaal ah.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
